text:
One build, our output is just one line with the unzip task information, and the 
next build its one line of output (same line repeats) for every file in the zip 
file.

What could cause this?
creator: ddeangelis@macromedia.com

text:
1. Are you using 1.4.1 or 1.5Alpha?  
2. Is the problem you state concerned with the output when Ant is run in
   -verbose mode?
If you are using 1.5Alpha, try a more recent build, as it has been recently 
fixed.  Otherwise, please provide relevant portions of your build file, the 
output that you get, etc. to illustrate the problem better.  I, for one, haven't
been able to comprehend your exact problem.
creator: umagesh@apache.org
umagesh@apache.org
text:
Did not hear back from user.  Closing it as already fixed.  Please reopen if 
problem persists, and please reply to my questions also while doing so.
